forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and wind. Rain may be heavy late. High 17C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and wind. Rain may be heavy late. High 63F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and wind. Rain becoming heavy at times late. Low 57F. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. A steady rain in the morning, with showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm. Localized flooding is possible.
